title: PESSAT ECE cutoff
content: What was the ece cutoff(both campuses) last year?

comments.body: I think it was 2.3k. Not sure
Seriously? Because cs at ec campus itself went till 2k.
I got 1770 rank. Is going to councelling worth it. I am considering ECE or CSE as options.
You'll mostly get cs in electronic City campus and ece in rr campus so yeah you should go for it:)
Thanks for replying! I can't find last year cutoffs of PESSAT. How did you get to know the cutoffs??
ECE RR campus was in the low 2300s and EC campus was in high 2700s (around 2780 ig)
